content: update 6 12 2025 a new version of the pattern has been uploaded the pattern has been corrected from row to rounds/ reihe zu runde the hanna hat is a two color brioche stitch hat it is knitted top down in the round out of two skeins of yarn which makes the pattern perfect to use up leftovers the pattern comes in english and german it includes a printable version in black and white with smaller font so only two pages have to be printed and a version for digital use the pattern is one size since brioche stitch is relatively stretchy it should fit most head sizes there are tips in the pattern on adjusting the size if you knit this hat and post it to instagram please use the hashtag #hannahat and tag me @pauli_knits **note that this pattern has not been tested if you have any questions regarding the pattern contact me on instagram @pauli_knits if you find any mistakes or think that the pattern can be improved please contact me as well **
